text: @StephenKing And worse, he’s playing on a weekend when the nation honors its dead. Therefore he’s thumbing his nose at both the coronavirus victims, and the men and women who died in war for our country. That includes those killed in Vietnam, the war Capt. Bone Spurs managed to dodge.
